linkedin_02_fullname_textfield.invalidRuleMessages: Full name must be at least 2 characters
Full name must contain only letters and spaces

linkedin_03_email_textfield.invalidRuleMessages: Please enter a valid email address

linkedin_04_position_textfield.invalidRuleMessages: Position must be at least 2 characters

linkedin_05_company_textfield.invalidRuleMessages: Company must be at least 2 characters

linkedin_09_university_textfield.invalidRuleMessages: University must be at least 2 characters

cases.description: agree_terms: unchecked, educationLevel: master, fullname: invalid, email: invalid, position: invalid, company: invalid, experience: valid, employment: Freelance, university: invalid, open_to_work: checked

asserts.text: Full name must be at least 2 characters
Please enter a valid email address
Position must be at least 2 characters
Company must be at least 2 characters
University must be at least 2 characters
You must agree to terms
